00006 int modules::navigator::LoadConfigFile(const char* filename){
00007     // Check we haven't already opened a modules file
00008     if(fModulesLoaded ) {
00009             cout<<"Error: Loading a new modules file, when one was already loaded"<<endl;
00010             return 1;
00011     }
00012     // Read in the file and dump the processed options
00013     int retVal=fModulesFile.ReadFile(filename);
00014     if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00015 
00016     // Check the file contained at least one module
00017     size_t num_modules=fModulesFile.GetNumModules();
00018     if(num_modules==0){
00019             cout<<"Warning: No modules were requested for use, so there's nothing to be done!"<<endl;
00020             return 2;
00021     }
00022     cout<<"Number of modules requested: "<<num_modules<<endl;
00023 
00024     // Everything finished ok
00025     fModulesLoaded=true;
00026     return 0;
00027 }

00029 int modules::navigator::MakeModules(){
00030     // Check that we've already opened a modules file
00031     if(!fModulesLoaded) {
00032             cout<<"Error: MakeModules(): Cannot make modules until you load a Modules file."<<endl;
00033             return 1;
00034     }
00035 
00036     // Loop over each requested module and build it
00037     // If we have any problems making a module then stop running
00038     modules::factory* mgr = modules::factory::Instance();
00039     std::string name;
00040     modules::options* opts;
00041     BaseModule* mod=NULL;
00042     size_t num_modules=fModulesFile.GetNumModules();
00043     for(unsigned i=0;i<num_modules;i++){
00044             name = fModulesFile.GetModule(i);
00045             opts =  fModulesFile.GetOptions(i);
00046       if(Debug()){
00047               cout<<"Creating module: "<<name<<endl;
00048               cout<<"With options:"<<endl;
00049               opts->DumpOptions("  ");
00050       }
00051             mod = mgr->createModule(name,opts);
00052             if(mod) AddModule(name, mod);
00053             else return 3;
00054     }
00055 
00056     // Everything finished ok
00057     return 0;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void modules::navigator::AddModule(const std::string& name, BaseModule* mod){
00061     fModules.push_back(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00062     fModulesSearch.insert(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00063 }
